```{r Fields_Addition_Formatting, echo = TRUE}
# Add source authority
CA_55M[, `:=` (source_authority = "IOTC")]

# Add fishing mode (to be removed in future exports)
CA_55M[, `:=` (fishing_mode = fifelse(CATCH_SCHOOL_TYPE_CODE == "LA", "LS",
                                         fifelse(CATCH_SCHOOL_TYPE_CODE == "UNCL", "UNK", 
                                                 fifelse(CATCH_SCHOOL_TYPE_CODE == "FD", "DEL",
                                                         CATCH_SCHOOL_TYPE_CODE))))]

# Add unit
CA_55M[, `:=` (unit = CATCH_UNIT_CODE)]

# Add measurements fields
CA_55M[, `:=` (measurement = "catch", measurement_type = "Landings")]

# Add measurement observation
CA_55M[, `:=` (measurement_obs = fifelse(RAISE_CODE == "OS", "original sample", 
                                              fifelse(RAISE_CODE == "SD", "raised", "unknown")))]

# Add time_start
CA_55M[, `:=` (time_start = as.character(as.Date(paste(YEAR, "-", MONTH_START, "-01", sep = ""), format = "%Y-%m-%d")))]

# Add time_end
CA_55M[, `:=` (time_end = as.character(as.Date(paste(YEAR, "-", MONTH_END, "-01", sep = ""), format = "%Y-%m-%d") %m+% months(1) - 1))]
```
